createProfileMockData.headline: Senior Full Stack Developer | Java & React Specialist
createProfileMockData.summary: Experienced software developer with 5+ years in building scalable web applications. Passionate about clean code, microservices architecture, and modern frontend frameworks. Strong background in Java Spring Boot, React, and cloud technologies.

experience.description: Lead development of microservices architecture using Spring Boot. Mentored junior developers and implemented CI/CD pipelines. Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization.
Developed responsive web applications using React and Spring Boot. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. Implemented automated testing strategies.

updateProfileMockData.headline: Lead Software Architect | Cloud & DevOps Expert
updateProfileMockData.summary: Senior software architect with 6+ years of experience in designing and implementing enterprise-level applications. Expert in cloud-native solutions, DevOps practices, and team leadership. Proven track record of delivering scalable systems that serve millions of users.

experience.description: Architect and oversee development of cloud-native applications. Lead a team of 8 developers. Designed microservices architecture serving 2M+ users. Implemented DevOps best practices reducing deployment time by 60%.
Lead development of microservices architecture using Spring Boot. Mentored junior developers and implemented CI/CD pipelines. Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization.
Developed responsive web applications using React and Spring Boot. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. Implemented automated testing strategies.

additionalExperienceMockData.description: Managed CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure. Automated deployment processes using Docker and Kubernetes. Reduced infrastructure costs by 30% through optimization.

minimalProfileMockData.headline: Junior Developer
minimalProfileMockData.summary: Recent computer science graduate looking for opportunities to grow and learn.

formFields.headline: Senior Full Stack Developer | Java & React Specialist
formFields.summary: Experienced software developer with 5+ years in building scalable web applications.
formFields.experience[0].description: Lead development of microservices architecture using Spring Boot.

updateProfileWithResume.description: Example of updating a profile with resume upload using multipart/form-data

formFields.headline: Lead Software Architect | Cloud & DevOps Expert
formFields.summary: Senior software architect with 6+ years of experience in designing enterprise applications.
formFields.experience[0].description: Architect and oversee development of cloud-native applications.

curlExamples.createProfile:
curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/profiles/seeker \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_JWT_TOKEN' \
  -F 'userId=123' \
  -F 'headline=Senior Full Stack Developer' \
  -F 'summary=Experienced software developer with 5+ years' \
  -F 'skills=Java,Spring Boot,React' \
  -F 'resume=@/path/to/resume.pdf'
curlExamples.updateProfile:
curl -X PUT http://localhost:8080/profiles/seeker/1 \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_JWT_TOKEN' \
  -F 'headline=Lead Software Architect' \
  -F 'summary=Senior software architect with 6+ years' \
  -F 'skills=Java,Spring Boot,React,AWS' \
  -F 'resume=@/path/to/updated-resume.pdf'
